entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Gogama
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with rain changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Snowfall amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 8. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
